1.0.name: wordpress/highlight-permalinked-comment
1.0.description: Sometimes it can be hard to tell which comment permalink you clicked on when it's at the bottom of a long page and doesn't float to the top of your browser. This WordPress plugin briefly highlights the a comment when its permalink is visited.
